overview: Grant is a product visionary with a strong focus on creating data-driven products. He excels at bridging the gap between technology and business, and inspiring others. Currently he is working on Weotta, a company he launched at Tech Crunch Disrupt New York 2011. Weotta’s mission is to build intelligent data-driven products to improve people’s everyday lives. Prior to Weotta he consulted for the Kauffman Foundation on the creation of Kauffman Labs. He also advised Venturehacks.com, helping them get AngelList off the ground.
